info.name: G1T6 SeekHealth API
info.description: SeekHealth is our effort to allow healthcare providers to aggregate thousands of appointments and consultation information. The SeekHealth API allows healthcare providers to bring features for both their internal and external users. # Features The SeekHealth API provides you programmatic access to many of the operations available on SeekHealth website. These features are utilized by both internal and external users. | Patient | Doctor | Pharmacist | | ------------- |:-------------: |:-------------:| | login/logout | login/logout | login/logout | | sign up | view all scheduled appointments | view all prescriptions | | view available time slots | view patient's details | | | book an appointment | create consultation information | | | view all scheduled appointments | | | # Structure The SeekHealth API comprises of 5 simple micro-services (SMS) and 2 complex micro-services (CMS). # Instructions Each method have multiple examples (e.g. successful operation, no appointment). To view the examples, please click on the dropdown button under **Example Request**. The API documentation can be either viewed in two ways: * web * download JSON file (under /esd_frontend folder)

item.description: The SMS are as follows: * Appointment * Doctor * Patient * Prescription * Employee The Employee SMS and Patient SMS utilises `Flask-Login` for user session management. `Flask-Login` handles common tasks such as logging in, logging out, and remembering your users' sessions over extended periods of time. Please refer to Flask documentation for reference.
